ygData.msgSnippet: Apeface gracefully soars out of the ships surrounding area. He flies towards a tall tree, and at his roaring 400 mph, transforms into his ape mode, Spasma

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Apeface gracefully soars out of the ships surrounding area. He flies
towards a tall tree, and at his roaring 400 mph, transforms into his ape
mode, Spasma holding on to his back, and does a graceful front flip,
before his feet grab into the thick bark of the tree to keep him
upright, as he looks around. "If he still alive, he not here." Apeface
reports.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Nightmare looks to Needlenose, "Yes sir. Suggest we release our sub
comander sir." he suggested, still at perfect attention, as the smoke
began to lesten, and he nodded towards the chamber Spinister was in.
______________________________________________________________________
Hook continues to wait for Mixmaster and Scavanger. He looks around, and
wonders what could be taking them so long.

OOC: Sorry to ask again Gunther, but where exactly is the base. I know
it's in Japan, but where? in the water, underground?
